headline: Assessing Lam Research (LRCX) Valuation After a 132% Year-to-Date Surge
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) has been on a quiet tear this year, with the stock up roughly 132% year to date and about 46% over the past 3 months, easily outpacing many chip peers. See our latest analysis for Lam Research. That surge in the 90 day share price return, alongside a triple digit year to date share price gain, suggests momentum is still building as investors lean into Lam's foundry and AI related demand story. If Lam's run has sharpened your appetite for semiconductor opportunities, now is...
